name: VMware-ESXi-Server
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>, Andrew Horton
description: VMware ESXi Server is virtual infrastructure software for partitioning, consolidating and managing systems in mission-critical environments. VMware ESXi Server provides a highly scalable virtual machine platform with advanced resource management capabilities, which can be managed by vSphere.

matches.text: <meta name="description" content="VMware ESXi Server is virtual infrastructure software for partitioning, consolidating, and managing systems in mission-critical environments. VMware ESXi Server provides a highly scalable virtual machine platform with advanced resource management capabilities, which can be managed by VMware vCenter Server.">
